features: 【𝗠𝗢𝗥𝗘 𝗕𝗘𝗔𝗨𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗨𝗟 𝗔𝗖𝗖𝗘𝗦𝗦𝗢𝗥𝗜𝗘𝗦】The rubber loom bands refill kit box comes with 𝟭𝟱𝟬𝟬𝟬+ pieces elastic rubber loom bands in 25 random colors and various kinds of accessories(random styles), including 1 twin loom, 30 pendant, 1 big crochet, 2 slingshot woven, 2 monster tail looms, 3 packs of beads, 2 packs of letter beads, 7 packs of S clips, 6 small crochets.

【𝗦𝗔𝗙𝗘 & 𝗗𝗨𝗥𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗠𝗔𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗜𝗔𝗟】The loom bands starter kit is made of high-quality and environmentally friendly rubber material, non-toxic and odorless, which is safe for children. The premium rubber resin also offers a strong elasticity and high toughness, durable. The accessories have no burrs and the loom tool edge is smooth, not easy to break, avoiding the child's hand injury.

【𝗜𝗡𝗦𝗣𝗜𝗥𝗘 𝗜𝗠𝗔𝗚𝗜𝗡𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡 & 𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗩𝗜𝗧𝗬】This DIY weaving bands set has different bright colors and multiple accessories, which can be freely combined and matched by your girls and boys to DIY through their own imagination, helping them make lots of unique wearable gadgets like rubber friendship bracelets, hair accessories, earrings, necklaces, improving their imagination, creativity and concentration power.

【𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗩𝗜𝗗𝗘 𝗛𝗢𝗨𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗙 𝗙𝗨𝗡】The loom rubber bands bracelet kit has a variety of creative play methods. Children can DIY various shapes to make more fun, it also exercises children's hand-eye coordination and practical ability, gains a sense of accomplishment and self-confidence. The rubber bands craft kit is good for children to enjoy their time with friends and parents.

【𝗣𝗢𝗥𝗧𝗔𝗕𝗟𝗘 𝗟𝗢𝗢𝗠 𝗦𝗘𝗧】The colored rubber bands are all stored neatly in a three-layer transparent plastic box and each color is arranged in individual compartments to search quickly. The loom bands starter kit box also can be used to store kids' handicrafts, lightweight and easy to store and carry, the twist bands kit is a perfect gift for Children's Day, Kids Birthday, Christmas, etc.
